Detailed Description

This class sets a vector of textures on a vector of D3DEffect property handles.

The list of constants is for the terrain effect file renderer, and this order should be represented in both then handles vector and the passed in texture vector.

If the effect file needs only 4 textures and the terrain block passes in 12 textures only the first 4 are set on the effect.
